data.eml:eml: New water mite species of the genus Arrenurus Dugs, 1834 (Acariformes, Hydrachnidia, Arrenuridae) from the Far East of Russia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tuzovskij, Petr V., Semenchenko, Ksenia A. (2011): New water mite species of the genus Arrenurus Dugs, 1834 (Acariformes, Hydrachnidia, Arrenuridae) from the Far East of Russia. Zootaxa 3037: 1-20, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278755
